TEXT.English: Determines how close your EPs have to be to the cost of a mission for it to be considered close to possible.
TEXT.Chinese: Determines how close your EPs have to be to the cost of a mission for it to be considered close to possible.

TEXT.English: Ratios greater than or equal to this value are colored with the following color.
TEXT.Chinese: Ratios greater than or equal to this value are colored with the following color.

TEXT.English: Good Color
TEXT.Chinese: Good Color

TEXT.English: Default color used for espionage ratios.
TEXT.Chinese: Default color used for espionage ratios.

TEXT.English: Bad Color
TEXT.Chinese: Bad Color

TEXT.English: Close Mission Color
TEXT.Chinese: Close Mission Color

TEXT.English: Ratio Color
TEXT.Chinese: Ratio Color

TEXT.English: When checked, shows calculated espionage information.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows calculated espionage information.

TEXT.English: Possible Mission Color
TEXT.Chinese: Possible Mission Color

TEXT.English: When checked, uses Almightix's Better Espionage Screen.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, uses Almightix's Better Espionage Screen.

TEXT.English: Color used for good espionage ratios.
TEXT.Chinese: Color used for good espionage ratios.

TEXT.English: Good Ratio Cutoff
TEXT.Chinese: Good Ratio Cutoff

TEXT.English: Show Calculated Information
TEXT.Chinese: Show Calculated Information

TEXT.English: Color used for bad espionage ratios.
TEXT.Chinese: Color used for bad espionage ratios.

TEXT.English: Better Espionage Screen
TEXT.Chinese: Better Espionage Screen

TEXT.English: Ratios less than or equal to this value are colored with the following color.
TEXT.Chinese: Ratios less than or equal to this value are colored with the following color.

TEXT.English: Close Percent Cutoff
TEXT.Chinese: Close Percent Cutoff

TEXT.English: Color used for missions that you can perform now (you have enough EPs against the target).
TEXT.Chinese: Color used for missions that you can perform now (you have enough EPs against the target).

TEXT.English: Bad Ratio Cutoff
TEXT.Chinese: Bad Ratio Cutoff

TEXT.English: Color used for missions that you can perform soon (you have close to enough EPs against the target).
TEXT.Chinese: Color used for missions that you can perform soon (you have close to enough EPs against the target).
